column4: Hi I've got a tarball installation file, how do I install it?
yes, I downloaded the tar installer for linux but I can't seem to install it
you need to extract it first
uhm i did, after that I do not know what to do
wouldn't have a clue, I'd have to look at the package
I know but any particular reason why you aren't installing it via the repos
i tried app but it's not available there
what version of ubuntu are you using
it's in maverick 10.10, the same version you're trying to install via source. You're much better and easier to install the version that's already been packaged
please, just install it via the terminal or synaptic. You're making it much harder for everyone unless you want to learn how to compile from source
:) okay i will, I'm still trying to get comfortable with Ubuntu
lots of things can stuff up if you don't know what you're doing, and even then there could be broken parts of your package if you don't know how to fix them manually
